quotes.quote: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forego an advantage.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: Seize opportunity by the beard, for it is bald behind.
quotes.author: Bulgarian Proverb

quotes.quote: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
quotes.author: Demosthenes

quotes.quote: You have to recognize when the right place and the right time fuse and take advantage of that opportunity. There are plenty of opportunities out there. You can't sit back and wait.
quotes.author: Ellen Metcalf

quotes.quote: There is no security on this earth, there is only opportunity.
quotes.author: General Douglas MacArthur

quotes.quote: Trouble is only opportunity in work clothes.
quotes.author: Henry J. Kaiser

quotes.quote: She had an unequalled gift... of squeezing big mistakes into small opportunities.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Too many people are thinking of security instead of opportunity. They seem more afraid of life than death.
quotes.author: James F. Byrnes

quotes.quote: The Chinese use two brush strokes to write the word 'crisis.' One brush stroke stands for danger; the other for opportunity. In a crisis, be aware of the danger - but recognize the opportunity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: We are continually faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as insoluble problems.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Equal opportunity means everyone will have a fair chance at being incompetent.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.
quotes.author: Patty Hansen

quotes.quote: While we stop to think, we often miss our opportunity.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: No great man ever complains of want of opportunity.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: THERE ARE NO MISTAKES, only opportunities.
quotes.author: Walt Kelly

quotes.quote: We are confronted with insurmountable opportunities.
